name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.7-a61f350dadb86fcf1bdab5877449f6db681818f4 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
